Title: Vieni avanti cretino
Writer: Lino Banfi (screenplay collaboration), Franco Bucceri (story and screenplay), Roberto Leoni (story and screenplay)
Actors: Lino Banfi, Franco Bracardi, Adriana Russo, Ramona Dell'Abate
Plot: The funny misadventures of a simpleton just out of jail, looking for a job until the very surreal ending.
